de.weltraumschaf.dht

Class CliOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.dht.CliOptions

  • public class CliOptions
extends Object
    Immutable container to hold the command line options. TODO Add validation for port and host.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean debug
      If debug information is requested by user.
      static int DEFAULT_ALPHA
      A small number representing the degree of parallelism in network calls, usually 3.
      private static int DEFAULT_B
      The size in bits of the keys used to identify nodes and store and retrieve data; in basic Kademlia this is 160, the length of a SHA-1 digest (hash).
      private static String DEFAULT_HOST
      Default host to listen on, if not given as CLI option.
      private static int DEFAULT_K
      k is the maximum number f contacts stored in a bucket this is normally 20.
      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      Default port to listen on, if not given as CLI option.
      private static int DEFAULT_T_EXPIRES
      The time in seconds after which a key/value pair expires, this is a time-to-live (TTL) from the original publication date.
      private static int DEFAULT_T_REFRESH
      Time in seconds after which an otherwise unaccessed bucket must be refreshed.
      private static int DEFAULT_T_REPLICATION
      Interval in seconds between Kademlia replication events,when a node is required to publish the entire database.
      private static int DEFAULT_T_REPUBLISH
      The time in seconds after which the original publisher must republish a key/value pair.
      private boolean help
      If help is requested by user.
      private String host
      Host name to listen on.
      private int port
      Port to listen on.
      private boolean version
      If version information is requested by user.

        public static final int DEFAULT_ALPHA
        A small number representing the degree of parallelism in network calls, usually 3.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_B

        private static final int DEFAULT_B
        The size in bits of the keys used to identify nodes and store and retrieve data; in basic Kademlia this is 160, the length of a SHA-1 digest (hash). In DHT it is 128 bits, the length of an UUID.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_K

        private static final int DEFAULT_K
        k is the maximum number f contacts stored in a bucket this is normally 20.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
